sentences.sContent: Have you two been introduced? Tom, this is Greg.
sentences.sCn: 有人给你们俩互相介绍了吗？汤姆，这位是格雷格。

sentences.sContent: They want to introduce a system of identity cards.
sentences.sCn: 他们想推行身份证制度。

sentences.sContent: The grey squirrel was introduced into Britain from North America.
sentences.sCn: 灰松鼠是由北美引入英国的。

sentences.sContent: ...The new rules will introduce as a part of anti-obesity campaign...
...it is my privilege to introduce to you today Mr...

words.tran: 介绍；引进；采用；入门；传入

trans.tranOther: if you introduce someone to another person, you tell them each other’s names for the first time
